text: The Ivy League is a part of the National Collegiate Athletic Association. It is made up of eight private research universities in the Northeastern United States. The term Ivy League is often used outside sports about the eight schools as a group of elite colleges meaning academic excellence and selectivity in admissions. This is a list of colleges and universities who play sports in the Ivy League: *Brown University *Columbia University *Cornell University *Dartmouth College *Harvard University *Princeton University *University of Pennsylvania *Yale University ==References== * Category:Colleges and universities in the United States
title: Ivy League
